player

Interface Player

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TronObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DummyPlayer, TronPlayer

    public interface Player
extends TronObject
    A Player is the main actor of the game. It can move round, pick up objects and tries to win the game

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canPerformAction()
      Returns whether this player can perform an action.
      int getAllowedNumberOfActions()
      Returns the allowed number of actions the player has left in this turn.
      SquareContainer getCurrentPosition()
      Returns the square this player currently stands on.
      int getID()
      Returns the unique ID-number associated with this player.
      java.util.List<IItem> getInventoryContent()
      Returns the Inventory-content associated with this player.
      SquareContainer getStartingPosition()
      Returns the square this player has to reach to win the game.
      boolean hasMovedYet()
      Return whether or not this player has already done a move action during this turn.
      boolean isDead()
      Test whether a player is actually dead.
      void performAction(Action action)
      Let the player perform a specified action.

      • Methods inherited from interface square.TronObject

        asAffectedByPowerFailure, asExplodable, asTeleportable

    • Method Detail

      • getID

        int getID()
        Returns the unique ID-number associated with this player.
        Returns:
        the ID associated with this player.

      • isDead

        boolean isDead()
        Test whether a player is actually dead. This can be used to remove player references without causing exceptions.
        Returns:
        True if the player is no longer part of the game

      • getStartingPosition

        SquareContainer getStartingPosition()
        Returns the square this player has to reach to win the game.
        Returns:
        the square this player has to reach to win the game.

        Returns the Inventory-content associated with this player.
        Returns:

      • getAllowedNumberOfActions

        int getAllowedNumberOfActions()
        Returns the allowed number of actions the player has left in this turn.
        Returns:
        the allowed number of actions the player has left.

      • hasMovedYet

        boolean hasMovedYet()
        Return whether or not this player has already done a move action during this turn.
        Returns:
        whether this player has already moved

      • canPerformAction

        boolean canPerformAction()
        Returns whether this player can perform an action. A player can perform an action if:
      • his state is PlayerState.ACTIVE
      • he has performed less then in his current turn (i.e. getAllowedNumberOfActions() > 0 ).
Returns:
whether this player is allowed to perform an action.

  • performAction

    void performAction(Action action)
    Let the player perform a specified action.
    Parameters:
    action - the action to perform
